name: Reflections VN Alpha
description:
this is the very first public alpha version of this still in development visual novel, again this is only a snapshot or proof of concept of a future project 

we're hoping you can get a basic idea of what's coming, inside the executable you can find a link to our official discord server where you can discuss the game and see extra content, additionally there's a link to a google form where you can share the feedback you might have and finally links to my social media and patreon where I will be receiving support to continue working on this project 

you can help this game become a reality by subscribing to my patreon to help me reach the goal I've set for this visual novel https://www.patreon.com/anastimafilia
